Posts.Content: hi...i realy think you have been unlucky with your BC nurse, if i had any problem i would ring her or she would come to see me...she even went down to my docs to try and push something through for me ...much to the annoyance of the receptionists lol, a year on i still have her number just if i want to ask something ....sorry you have not been as lucky x
Posts.Title: Breast Care Nurse
